meanings.definition: A plant-based milk alternative made from soybeans.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy drinking soymilks with my cereal every morning.
meanings.sent2: Many people choose soymilks as a dairy-free option.
meanings.sent3: The soymilks in the fridge were having a party, but they spilled their own drinks!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter sounded as smooth as soymilks flowing from a carton.
meanings.sent5: The soymilks on the shelf looked like a row of white soldiers ready for battle.

meanings.definition: The act of producing or consuming soymilks.
meanings.sent1: The soymilks production line was running smoothly all day.
meanings.sent2: She studied the process of soymilks production for her school project.
meanings.sent3: The soymilks were so excited to be consumed that they jumped into the blender themselves!
meanings.sent4: The market for soymilks consumption was booming in the city.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly produced soymilks filled the room with a comforting scent.
